name: Swordplay
description: Skill with gladius (short sword) and other blades. Parrying, thrusting, saberlike trajectories.

name: Archery
description: Skill with bows: longbow, crossbow, horn bow. Accuracy and range.

name: Spear Fighting
description: Combat with spears, lances. Throwing and melee use.

name: Unarmed Combat
description: Fighting without weapons. Martial arts-like techniques. Warriors train both arms.

name: Tarn Riding
description: Ability to fly and control tarns. Tarn goad use, aerial maneuvering, mounted combat.
notes: Elite skill. Tarn may attack rider if not skilled.

name: Kaiila Riding
description: Ride carnivorous kaiila mounts. Speed, agility, mounted combat.

name: Tharlarion Riding
description: Ride saddle lizards. Voice commands, lance butt to eye/ear.

name: Tracking
description: Follow tracks and signs. Hunt prey, track escaped slaves.

name: Scent Tracking
description: Follow prey/targets by scent alone. Natural ability for some species.
notes: Sleen are masters - can track days-old scent for hundreds of pasangs

name: Stealth
description: Move silently, hide, avoid detection. Essential for hunters and assassins.

name: Observation
description: Acute awareness of surroundings. Warriors unconsciously size up situations.

name: Night Fighting
description: Combat tactics in darkness. Misdirection, back kicks, sound awareness.

name: Capture Techniques
description: Capture knot (under 3 Ihn), binding, subduing without killing. Slave capture.

name: Hunting
description: Track, stalk, and kill game animals. Butchering, hide preparation.

name: Fishing
description: Catch fish with nets, lines, spears. River and sea fishing.

name: Sailing
description: Navigate ships, read weather, manage crew. Essential for sea travel.

name: Swimming
description: Swim in rivers, seas, baths. Essential for survival near water.

name: Climbing
description: Climb walls, cliffs, trees. Escape, infiltration, hunting.

name: Literacy
description: Read and write Gorean script. Rare skill, somewhat undignified for warriors.
notes: Warriors often illiterate or semi-literate by choice

name: Old Gorean
description: Read and write archaic Gorean language. Used by Initiates for ceremonies, Physicians for records.

name: Taharic Script
description: Read and write Tahari alphabet. Correlated to Gorean phonemes, graceful script.

name: Medicine
description: Heal wounds, treat illness, surgery. Oath to heal all who ask.

name: Persuasion
description: Convince, negotiate, inspire. Leadership and diplomatic skill.

name: Intimidation
description: Cow opponents, extract information, command through fear.

name: Animal Handling
description: Train and command animals: sleen, tarns, tharlarions, bosk, etc.

name: Pack Tactics
description: Coordinated hunting with pack/pride. Flanking, driving prey, communication.

name: Flight
description: Aerial maneuvering, combat while flying, landing, takeoff techniques.

name: Crafting
description: Create items: weapons, tools, clothing, art. Varies by culture and caste.

name: Carving
description: Carve ivory, bone, stone. Red Hunter art - rounded shapes, animals.
notes: Red Hunters: all men carve, no word for 'artist'

name: Singing
description: Create and perform songs. Personal property in some cultures.

name: Kaissa
description: Gorean chess. Strategic thinking. Torvaldsland especially passionate.
notes: Torvaldsland has unique pieces: Jarl, Jarl's Woman, Axes, Singers, Rune-Priests

name: Desert Survival
description: Water conservation, heat management, desert navigation, finding oases.

name: Arctic Survival
description: Cold resistance, iglu building, ice travel, hunting in extreme cold.

name: Jungle Survival
description: Navigate rainforest, identify plants/animals, avoid dangers, jungle tracking.

name: Slave Training
description: Train slaves in obedience, skills, disciplines. Slaver specialty.

name: Trade & Commerce
description: Negotiation, appraisal, market knowledge, caravan management.
